Name: Freminet
Title: "Yearning for Unseen Depths" Freminet
Desc: Alone under the cold light of stars.
Source: Reward for inviting Freminet to a duel at The Cat's Tail and claiming victory in a Friendly Fracas with him

11122.Name: Pressurized Floe
11122.Desc: Deals $[D__KEY__DAMAGE] $[D__KEY__ELEMENT]. If this character has not yet gained <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C111121]</color>, they will gain <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C111121]</color>.

C111121.Name: Pers Timer
C111121.Desc: <color=#FFFFFFFF>For every 1 card you draw:</color> This card will gain 1 <color=#FFFFFFFF>Pressure Level</color>.\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>When the attached character uses $[S11122]:</color> If <color=#FFFFFFFF>Pressure Level</color> is at least 2, cancel this effect, and the Skill costs 1 less Elemental Die. If, after the Skill is finalized, the Pressure Level is at least 4, deal 2 additional $[K100].

K100.Name: {SPRITE_PRESET#2100}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Physical DMG</color>
K100.Desc: Physical DMG will not apply any Elements, nor can it engage in Elemental Reactions.

C111122.Name: Subnautical Hunter Mode
C111122.Desc: <color=#FFFFFFFF>After you draw 3 cards:</color> Grants 1 $[K6] point to defend the attached character. (Can stack. Max 2 points.)\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>After the attached character uses a Normal Attack or Elemental Skill:</color> Place up to 2 cards with the highest Elemental Dice Cost in your Hand at the bottom of your deck, then draw the same number of cards.\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>$[K4]: 2</color>

K6.Name: {SPRITE_PRESET#4007}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Shield</color>
K6.Desc: This Shield will be consumed to protect the character who equips it from DMG.

K4.Name: <color=#FFFFFFFF>Duration (Rounds)</color>
K4.Desc: Each time you reach the end of a Round, <color=#FFFFFFFF>Duration (Rounds)</color> -1.\nThis card will be discarded immediately once <color=#FFFFFFFF>Duration (Rounds)</color> runs out.
